text: Ami manusake pita-matara sathe sadbyabahara karara jora nirdesa diyechi. Yadi tara tomake amara sathe emana kichu sarika karara jora pracesta calaya, yara samparke tomara kona jnana ne'i, tabe tadera anugatya karo na. Amara'i dike tomadera pratyabartana. Atahpara ami tomaderake bale deba ya kichu tomara karate.
